children.name: Brokerage dashboard
children.description: Main dashboard for brokerage-srvc
children.title: Brokerage dashboard

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=prod/app/java and _sourceName=brokerage-srvc
AND "NYDIG Positions for brokerageAccountId"
| timeslice 1h
| count as OK by _timeslice

_sourceCategory=prod/app/java and "Data fetcher failure: code=ERROR_FETCHING_POSITION_FROM_PARTNER operationType=QUERY operation=null type=BrokerageHolding field=balance"
| timeslice 1h
| count as ERROR by _timeslice

// BE SURE TO BE IN PT TIMEZONE
_sourceCategory=prod/app/java and _sourceName=brokerage*
AND "INFO"
| json auto
| where p="INFO"
| where 
 (m matches ("*Transitioning order with requestReference=*") 
AND
 (m matches ("*requestToken=*")) AND (m matches ("*to status=BOOKED*"))
)
| timeslice 1h
| count as BOOKED by _timeslice

// BE SURE TO BE IN PT TIMEZONE
_sourceCategory=prod/app/java and _sourceName=brokerage-srvc
AND "INFO"
| json auto
| where p="INFO"
| where (m matches ("Transfer request received, input=*"))
| timeslice 1d
| count as Received by _timeslice

_sourceCategory=prod/app/java and _sourceName=brokerage*
AND "INFO"
| json auto
| where p="INFO"
| where (m matches ("Account of type Brokerage created for actorID=*"))
| timeslice 1d
| count as Brokerage by _timeslice

_sourceCategory=prod/app/java and _sourceName=creditline* AND
"Handling MasterLineRewardEnrollCommand"
| timeslice 1d
| count as MasterLine by _timeslice

_sourceCategory="prod/app/java" AND _sourceName="card-srvc" AND "Auth notification saved as marqetaNotification."
| json auto
| where p = "INFO"
| where app = "card-srvc"
| where m matches ("Auth notification saved as marqetaNotification. ID=*, token=*, accountNumber=*, gatewayResponseTimedOut=*, state=*, type=*")
| parse "state=*," as state
| where state matches ("DECLINED") OR state matches ("PENDING") 
| if (state matches "DECLINED*", 1, 0) as declinedTransaction
| if (state matches "*", 1, 0) as totalTransaction
| timeslice 1h
| sum(declinedTransaction) as declinedTransaction, sum(totalTransaction) as totalTransaction group by _timeslice
| sort _timeslice asc
| (declinedTransaction/totalTransaction)*100 as percent
| fields _timeslice, percent

_sourceCategory="prod/app/java" AND _sourceName="card-srvc" AND "Auth notification saved as marqetaNotification."
| json auto
| where p = "INFO"
| where app = "card-srvc"
| where m matches ("Auth notification saved as marqetaNotification. ID=*, token=*, accountNumber=*, gatewayResponseTimedOut=*, state=*, type=*")
| parse "gatewayResponseTimedOut=*," as timedout 
| if (timedout matches "true*", 1, 0) as timedoutTransaction
| if (timedout matches "*", 1, 0) as totalTransaction
| timeslice 15m
| sum(timedoutTransaction) as timedoutTransaction, sum(totalTransaction) as totalTransaction group by _timeslice
//| sort _timeslice asc
| (timedoutTransaction/totalTransaction)*100 as percent
| fields _timeslice, percent 
| sort _timeslice asc

_sourceCategory="prod/app/java" AND _sourceName="card-srvc" AND "Auth notification saved as marqetaNotification."
| json auto
| where p = "INFO"
| where app = "card-srvc"
| where m matches ("Auth notification saved as marqetaNotification.*")
| timeslice 1h
| count _timeslice
| sort _timeslice asc

_sourceCategory="prod/app/java" AND _sourceName="card-srvc" AND "Auth notification saved as marqetaNotification."
| json auto
| where p = "INFO"
| where app = "card-srvc"
| where m matches ("Auth notification saved as marqetaNotification. ID=*, token=*, accountNumber=*, gatewayResponseTimedOut=*, state=*, type=*")
| parse "gatewayResponseTimedOut=*," as timedout 
| if (timedout matches "true*", 1, 0) as timedoutTransaction
| if (timedout matches "*", 1, 0) as totalTransaction
| timeslice 15m
| sum(timedoutTransaction) as timedoutTransaction, sum(totalTransaction) as totalTransaction group by _timeslice
//| sort _timeslice asc
| (timedoutTransaction/totalTransaction)*100 as percent
| fields _timeslice, percent 
| sort _timeslice asc

panels.title: Balance Transfer requested at Funnel Account Opening

queries.queryString:
("Initializing ledger for masterLineBalanceSto")
AND _sourcecategory = "prod/app/java"
| keyvalue regex "=(.*?)," keys "accountNumber", "balanceTransferLockedAmount" as accountNumber, btAmount
| btAmount > 0 as btRequested 
| where btRequested in (true)
| timeslice 1d
| count by btRequested , _timeslice 
| transpose row _timeslice column btRequested

panels.title: Balance Transfer Draw count Requested Locked Balance Used

queries.queryString:
("Updating ledger for balance transfer submission")
AND _sourcecategory = "prod/app/java"
| keyvalue regex "=(.*?)," keys "balanceTransferLockedAmountToBeUsed" as btLockedAmount
| btLockedAmount > 0 as btLockedAmountUsed
| where btLockedAmountUsed in (true)
| timeslice 1d
| count by btLockedAmountUsed , _timeslice 
| transpose row _timeslice column btLockedAmountUsed

("Updating ledger for balance transfer submission")
AND _sourcecategory = "prod/app/java"
| keyvalue regex "=(.*?)," keys "balanceTransferLockedAmountToBeUsed", "availableBalanceToBeUsed" as bt_amount_used, avail_amount_used
| timeslice 1d
| sum(bt_amount_used) as total_bt_amount_used, sum(avail_amount_used) as total_avail_amount_used  by _timeslice

panels.title: Balance Update per type - idempotency key

queries.queryString:
// BE SURE TO BE IN PT TIMEZONE
cluster=prod "card-funding-srvc" "Updating balance for masterLineAccountNumber"  | parse "idempotencyKey*-" as idempotencyKey
| timeslice 1d

_sourcecategory=prod/app/java AND (_sourceName=/app/card-srvc-server-*-RC/logs/server.log OR _sourceName="card-srvc")
AND "ERROR" 
AND NOT "UnknownProducerIdException"
| json auto
| where p="ERROR"
| where !(
 (l matches ("*.HttpProjectConfigManager") and m = "Error fetching datafile") // Optimizely timeout (PLC-6294)
 OR (stacktrace matches ("*CfClientException*code=4000013,*message=Draw desired amount exceeds available credit for masterLineAccountNumber=*"))
 OR (stacktrace matches ("*CfClientException*code=4000014*message=Masterline not found with masterLineAccountNumber=*"))
 OR (stacktrace matches ("*CfClientException*code=400037*message=Draws are not allowed for masterLineAccountNumber=*"))
 OR (stacktrace matches ("*CfClientException: httpStatus=500 INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR, errorResponse=CfErrorResponse(code=4000011, codeName=OFFERS_NOT_GENERATED, message=Offers were not generated for masterLineAccountNumber*"))
 OR (stacktrace matches ("*CfClientException: httpStatus=404 NOT_FOUND, errorResponse=CfErrorResponse(code=400040, codeName=ACCESS_CARD_AUTH_NOT_FOUND*"))
 OR (stacktrace matches ("*CfNotFoundException: Active card not found for cardToken=*"))
 OR (stacktrace matches ("*CfNotFoundException: Card not found for cardToken=*") AND m matches ("*CONSUME_FAILED,topic=upg.prod.event.marqeta.cardTransition*"))
 OR (stacktrace matches ("*CfNotFoundException: Card not found for cardToken=*") AND m matches ("*CONSUME_RETRIES_EXHAUSTED,topic=upg.prod.event.marqeta.cardTransition*"))
 OR (stacktrace matches ("*CfBadRequestException: Card cannot be updated to * status. reason=Card is already in the same state.*")) // PLC-5113
 OR (stacktrace matches ("*CfBadRequestException: Card cannot be updated to ACTIVE status. reason=Transition not allowed from TERMINATED to ACTIVE*")) // PLC-5113
 OR (stacktrace matches ("*CfBadRequestException: Card cannot be updated to TERMINATED status. reason=Transition not allowed from DRAFT to TERMINATED*")) // PLC-5113
 OR (stacktrace matches ("*JitFundingSuspciousActivityDetectedEvent in long null of long in field externalCustomerId of com.credify.card.model.event.JitFundingSuspciousActivityDetectedEvent*"))
 OR (stacktrace matches ("*ERROR: unsupported Unicode escape sequence*"))
 OR (stacktrace matches ("*org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: invalid byte sequence for encoding*"))
 OR (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"task_execution_idempotency_idx\"\n  Detail: Key (task_name, idempotency_key)=(UPDATE_MARQETA_USER_CONTACT_INFO*"))
 OR (m matches ("*ERROR: unsupported Unicode escape sequence*"))
 OR (m matches ("*Error during managed flush [org.hibernate.exception.DataException: could not execute statement]*"))
 OR (m matches ("*ERROR: invalid byte sequence for encoding*"))
 OR (m matches ("*Notification for a timeout authorization. Lineserivicing might need to be updated to cancel the draw*"))
 OR (m matches ("*Defaulting to using Visa Signature Preferred program*"))
 OR (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"task_execution_idempotency_idx\"\n  Detail: Key (task_name, idempotency_key)=(FRAUD_RESOLUTION_ACTIONS_TASK,*"))
 OR (m matches /.*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint "event_queue_idempotency_idx"(.|\n)*Detail: Key \(type, idempotency_key\)=\(marqeta.(transaction|cardTransition|digitalWalletTokenTransition|userTransition|3DSTransition).*/) //PLC-5117,5276,6450
 OR ((m matches ("*HHH000346: Error during managed flush [org.hibernate.exception.ConstraintViolationException: could not execute statement]*"))
   AND (t matches ("*updateUserContactInfoInCardSrvc*")))
 OR (m matches ("*CfBadRequestException: Address sent by user does not match current address in card service*"))
 OR (m matches ("*codeName=CARD_CREATION_ADDRESS_MISMATCH, message=Address sent by user does not match current address in card service.*")) // PCL-5191
 OR (stacktrace matches ("*org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.exceptions.InvalidTokenException: Access token expired*"))
 OR (stacktrace matches ("*org.hibernate.StaleObjectStateException: Row was updated or deleted by another transaction (or unsaved-value mapping was incorrect) : [com.credify.card.refund.data.domain.RefundProcessing*")) //PLC-3947
 OR (m matches ("*Card cannot be updated to TERMINATED status. reason=Exists a TERMINATED transition for that given card. cardToken=* ,*")) // ongoing investigation PLC-6281 / PLC-6284
 OR (m matches ("*codeName=CARD_CANNOT_BE_REPLACED, message=Card * cannot be replaced because its status is UNACTIVATED*")) // PLC-6326 / PLC-6284
OR (stacktrace matches ("*Not an enum: null for schema*") AND stacktrace matches ("*RefundProcessingType*")) // ONE-616
OR (stacktrace matches ("*Too many iterations due to replication lag wait periods*") AND stacktrace matches ("*ArchivedTaskExecutionsRepositoryCustom*")) //PLC-4474 to remove exclusions
OR (stacktrace matches "*duplicate key value violates unique constraint*" and stacktrace matches "*PCL_PHYSICAL_CARD) already exists.*") //PLC-6688
OR (m matches "*duplicate key value violates unique constraint*" and m matches "*PCL_PHYSICAL_CARD) already exists.*") //PLC-6688
OR (m matches "*ErrorResponse=CfErrorResponse(code=0, codeName=null, message=Unexpected server exception of type HttpMessageNotReadableException, retryable=false, type=ABNORMAL, httpStatus=null), message=JSON parse error: Numeric value*"  AND stacktrace matches ("*com.credify.marqeta.external.model.ThreeDSTransition*")) //PLC-6778 and PLC-6779
OR (stacktrace matches ("*com.credify.core.exception.CfNotFoundException: Card not found for cardToken=296b9039-ab8b-4fdd-8ffd-afffd571ef6a*")) // Isolated customer with a card created on MQ -- investigation ongoing with Andy
OR (stacktrace matches "*[401 Unauthorized] during [POST] to [https://upgrade-api.marqeta.com:443/v3/users/auth/clientaccesstoken]*") // PLC-6163
OR (m matches "*MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException*Failed to convert value of type*" and srcid="app-by-phone-ui") //PLC-6357 - agent input that we can't fix
OR (m matches "*Offset commit failed on partition * The coordinator is not aware of this member*") //non-actionable kafka hiccup
OR (stacktrace matches "*The reissue source card must be latest active or suspended card in the chain*") // PLC-7219
OR (m matches "*MarqetaOnboardingTask*" and stacktrace matches "*Unable to generate card verification value*") // PLC-7481
OR (stacktrace matches "*com.credify.core.exception.CfNotFoundException: CardProduct not found for given cardProductToken=*prefix_swipe_test*")
)
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice

_sourceCategory=prod/app/java
AND (_sourceName=/app/creditline-servicing-server-*-RC/logs/server.log OR _sourceName="creditline-servicing-srvc")
AND "ERROR"
AND !"UnknownProducerIdException"
| formatDate(_messagetime, "HH") as hour
| json auto
| where p = "ERROR"
| where !(
  (stacktrace matches ("*org.apache.catalina.connector.ClientAbortException: java.io.IOException: Broken pipe*"))
  OR (l matches ("*.HttpProjectConfigManager") and m = "Error fetching datafile") // Optimizely timeout (PLC-6294)
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*CfBadRequestException: Invalid hardship SubLine details for masterLineAccountNumber*"))
  OR (m matches ("*errorResponse is null. Possibly n/w outage*"))
  OR (m matches ("Exception during execution of state machine operation. retryState=ABORTED, retryCount=1, msg=Cannot enroll subLineAccountNumber=* for masterLineAccountNumber=* into hardship planUuid=*  with daysPastDue=* and numberOfPastDueBills=*"))
  OR (m matches ("*SP00379 - More than one active Customer record found for*"))
  OR (m matches ("*SP01218 - Only Account Status of OPEN or PIPELINE is valid for this function.*"))
  OR (m matches ("*SP01859 - customer.financialAccounts[0].abaRoutingNumber is required when customer.financialAccounts[0].isEligibleForPaymentDraft is true*"))
  OR (m matches ("*SP02370 - An inactive PaymentDraft with Financial Account*")) // ADDED to stop leaking PII in logs
  OR (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"payment_message_id_key\"*"))
  OR (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"ledger_journal_entry_idempotency_key_key\"*  Detail: Key (idempotency_key)=(DRAW_CANCELLED-ACCESS_CARD_*) already exists."))
  OR (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"brokerage_account_payment_request_idempotency_key_status_uk\"*"))
  OR (message matches ("*SP01218 - Only Account Status of OPEN or PIPELINE is valid for this function.*"))
  OR (message matches ("*SP01859 - customer.financialAccounts[0].abaRoutingNumber is required when customer.financialAccounts[0].isEligibleForPaymentDraft is true.*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SP00365 - Error reading MasterLineOfCredit using MasterLineOfCredit 0.*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SP00579 - No more than one Payment Draft may exist.*")) // UPGR-1102
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SP01218 - Only Account Status of OPEN or PIPELINE is valid for this function.*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SP02235 - Sub-Line Payment Schedule Due Date *must equal due date *of existing sub-lines when Bill Pay as Master LOC Level is true*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: SP01325 - Transaction (ADD1TMMLOC - One Time Master LOC ACH Payment)*")) // to be removed once PLC-7356 is completed
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: System Exception, java.lang.NullPointerException*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: SP00536 - is required*")) // Covered by Ops team on daily reports monitoring
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: SP00238 - $0.00 is invalid for adjustment.amount. Must be greater than  $0.00*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: SP00365 - Error reading Customer using Customer 0*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: SP00380 - Error processing   shaw.spectrum.core.billinghistory.payments.service.LineOfCreditBillingHistoryPaymentService.processLineOfCreditBillingHistoryPostPaymentEvent*"))
  OR ((stacktrace matches "*Read timed out executing * https://spectrumapi*")
      OR (stacktrace matches "*spectrum.exceptions.SpectrumUnauthorizedException*")
      OR (stacktrace matches "*Unexpected server exception of type SpectrumUnauthorizedException*")) // see "PCL-CLSS Spectrum Auth alert"
  OR (stacktrace matches "*CfErrorResponse(code=1815, codeName=UNEXPECTED_ERROR, message=Server Exception while creating new decision*") // PLC-5165
  OR (m matches "*Account with getExternalAccountId *-PENDING_PRINCIPAL_PAYMENT does not allow overdraft but has a balance*")            // PLC-5312
  OR (m matches "*ledger_journal_entry_idempotency_key_key*Detail: Key (idempotency_key)=(PENDING_PRINCIPAL_PAYMENT_RELEASE-*")          // PLC-5312
  OR (stacktrace matches "*ledger_journal_entry_idempotency_key_key*Detail: Key (idempotency_key)=(PENDING_PRINCIPAL_PAYMENT_RELEASE-*") // PLC-5312
  OR (m matches "*Cannot find chargeoff account for loanHoldingSummaryId=[*],  loanAccountNumber=*") // PLC-4614
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.exceptions.InvalidTokenException: Access token*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"draw_idempotency_key_unique_constraint\"*")) //PLC-3635
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*com.credify.creditlineservicing.service.payment.MasterlinePayOffAmountService.getPayOffQuote(MasterlinePayOffAmountService.java:101)*") and ("*SP00445 - Account is not open; it cannot be modified.*")) //PLC-6075
  OR (m matches "*INVALID_AMOUNT_FOR_PAYMENT_WITH_BROKERAGE_CASH_BALANCE*")    // PLC-6119
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*com.credify.core.exception.CfInternalServerException: Minimum draw limits are missing*")) //PLC-5993
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*com.credify.core.exception.CfInternalServerException: Unexpected error occurred while calling spectrum*")
  OR (m matches "*Principal Curtailment payment NOT scheduled in spectrum for OneTimePaymentId=*")//ONE-506
  OR (m matches "*SP00589*")//ONE-506
  OR (stacktrace matches "*com.credify.creditlineservicing.service.event.UpdatePreferredDisbursementToACHFacade*")//PLC-3947 (Listener Fix on Platform for log)
OR (m matches "*is not postable when Allowed Transaction Closed To Posting is set to CLOSED*") //PLC-6318
OR (m matches "*Unexpected server exception of type DataIntegrityViolationException*" and m matches "*auto_pay_account_number_idx*") //PLC-6688
OR (m matches "*duplicate key value violates unique constraint*" and m matches "*auto_pay_account_number_idx*") //PLC-6688
OR (m matches "*ObjectOptimisticLockingFailureException*" and m matches "*com.credify.creditlineservicing.data.domain.AutoPay*") //PLC-6688
OR (m matches "*No reward account found for given masterLineAccountNumber*" and m matches "*NO_MASTER_LINE_REWARD_ACCOUNT_FOUND*") //PLC-7066
OR ((stacktrace matches "*[401 Unauthorized]*" or stacktrace matches "*invalid_token*")
    and stacktrace matches "*TabapayServiceGatewayImpl.queryCardInfo*") //PLC-6523
OR (m matches "*Data fetcher failure: operationType=QUERY operation=getMasterLineAccountDetailsSummary type=MasterLineAccountDetailsSummary field=paymentDetails*")
OR (m matches "*MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException*Failed to convert value of type*" and srcid="app-by-phone-ui") //PLC-6357 - agent input that we can't fix
OR (m matches "*Offset commit failed on partition * The coordinator is not aware of this member*") //non-actionable kafka hiccup
OR (m matches "*SP02371 - Financial Account already exists with*") //PLC-7326
OR (m matches "*one-time payment NOT scheduled in spectrum for OneTimePaymentId*" and stacktrace matches "*SP00366 - Error updating MasterLineOfCredit using ID*") // PLC-7476
OR (m matches "*has no financial account that can be used to receive disbursements*" and stacktrace matches "*RewardCashOutService*") //PLC-7241


))
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice

panels.title: Number of "PROD-PCL-Task Execution ABORTED" per day

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=prod/app/java 
and ("marker=TASK_QUEUE_PROCESSOR,operation=EXECUTE_TASK" OR "Exception during execution of state machine operation" ) 
| json auto
| where p = "WARN" OR p = "ERROR"
| where app = "creditline-servicing-srvc-async" OR app = "card-srvc"
| fields m, t, tid, sid, srcid, cid, app
| transactionize tid (merge tid takeFirst, sid takeFirst, m join with "\n\n", srcid takeFirst, cid takeFirst, app takeFirst)
| keyvalue auto field=m
| where retryState="ABORTED"
| id as TaskId
| fields m, tid, sid, srcid, cid, app, taskId, taskName, retryCount, _raw
| where taskName not in ( "LINE_SERVICING_AUTH_CANCEL_ACTION", "MASTER_LINE_HARDSHIP_ENROLLMENT_TASK","MASTERLINE_CYCLING_TASK", "POST_CHARGEOFF_ACCOUNT_UPDATE_TASK") 
| where !(
  (m matches "*SP00723*") // PLC-3718
  OR (m matches "*SP00365 - Error reading BillingHistory using BillingHistory*") // PLC-4344
  OR (m matches "*SP02410 - Actions related to Payment Drafts can only be done at MLOC level.*") // PLC-5089
  OR (m matches "*Hardship*cannot be applied because it requires to modify a payment with an already paid bill for masterLineAccountNumber*") // PLC-5127
  OR (_raw matches ("*CfBadRequestException: Card cannot be updated to * status. reason=Card is already in the same state.*")) // PLC-5113
  OR (_raw matches ("*CfBadRequestException: Card cannot be updated to * status. reason=Transition not allowed from TERMINATED to ACTIVE*")) // PLC-5113
  OR (_raw matches ("*The reissue source card must be latest active or suspended card in the chain*")) // PLC-7219
)
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice

panels.title: Number of "Alert - Rewards, Brokerage and Ledger - General Errors" per day

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=prod/app/java AND (_sourceName=rewards-srvc OR _sourceName=ledger-srvc OR _sourceName=brokerage* OR _sourceName=dosh-rewards-srvc) 
AND "ERROR"
AND NOT "UnknownProducerIdException"
| json auto
| where p="ERROR"
| where !(
  (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"account_external_id_external_type_idx\"*"))
  OR (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"book_external_id_external_type_idx\"*"))
  OR (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"stage_journal_entry_external_id_external_type_idx\"*")) // PLC-5011
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*com.credify.doshrewards.external.DoshApiClient*") OR l matches "*.DoshApiClient") // "PCL - dosh-rewards-srvc DoshApiClient alert"
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.exceptions.InvalidTokenException: Access token expired*")) // Used by login-client
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*PAM authentication failed for user*")) // ARC-3923
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*PrematureCloseException: Connection prematurely closed BEFORE response*")) // PLC-6261
  OR (m matches ("Error fetching Dosh offers search for accountID*")) // PLC-7160
  OR (stacktrace matches ("org.apache.http.NoHttpResponseException: logx.optimizely.com:443 failed to respond*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*unexpected response from event endpoint, status: 408*com.optimizely.ab.OptimizelyHttpClient.execute*"))
)
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice

panels.title: Note
panels.text:
- Since queries used by the panels are not the actual saved queries, please update the queries of the panels at the end of each round of support to sync the ongoing exclusions.
- Please use alerts avg count on dev support rotation report

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=prod/app/java
AND (_sourceName=/app/creditline-servicing-server-*-RC/logs/server.log OR _sourceName="creditline-servicing-srvc")
AND "ERROR"
AND !"UnknownProducerIdException"
| formatDate(_messagetime, "HH") as hour
| json auto
| where p = "ERROR"
| where !(
  (stacktrace matches ("*org.apache.catalina.connector.ClientAbortException: java.io.IOException: Broken pipe*"))
  OR (l matches ("*.HttpProjectConfigManager") and m = "Error fetching datafile") // Optimizely timeout (PLC-6294)
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*CfBadRequestException: Invalid hardship SubLine details for masterLineAccountNumber*"))
  OR (m matches ("*errorResponse is null. Possibly n/w outage*"))
  OR (m matches ("Exception during execution of state machine operation. retryState=ABORTED, retryCount=1, msg=Cannot enroll subLineAccountNumber=* for masterLineAccountNumber=* into hardship planUuid=*  with daysPastDue=* and numberOfPastDueBills=*"))
  OR (m matches ("*SP00379 - More than one active Customer record found for*"))
  OR (m matches ("*SP01218 - Only Account Status of OPEN or PIPELINE is valid for this function.*"))
  OR (m matches ("*SP01859 - customer.financialAccounts[0].abaRoutingNumber is required when customer.financialAccounts[0].isEligibleForPaymentDraft is true*"))
  OR (m matches ("*SP02370 - An inactive PaymentDraft with Financial Account*")) // ADDED to stop leaking PII in logs
  OR (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"payment_message_id_key\"*"))
  OR (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"ledger_journal_entry_idempotency_key_key\"*  Detail: Key (idempotency_key)=(DRAW_CANCELLED-ACCESS_CARD_*) already exists."))
  OR (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"brokerage_account_payment_request_idempotency_key_status_uk\"*"))
  OR (message matches ("*SP01218 - Only Account Status of OPEN or PIPELINE is valid for this function.*"))
  OR (message matches ("*SP01859 - customer.financialAccounts[0].abaRoutingNumber is required when customer.financialAccounts[0].isEligibleForPaymentDraft is true.*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SP00365 - Error reading MasterLineOfCredit using MasterLineOfCredit 0.*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SP00579 - No more than one Payment Draft may exist.*")) // UPGR-1102
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SP01218 - Only Account Status of OPEN or PIPELINE is valid for this function.*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SP02235 - Sub-Line Payment Schedule Due Date *must equal due date *of existing sub-lines when Bill Pay as Master LOC Level is true*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: SP01325 - Transaction (ADD1TMMLOC - One Time Master LOC ACH Payment)*")) // to be removed once PLC-7356 is completed
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: System Exception, java.lang.NullPointerException*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: SP00536 - is required*")) // Covered by Ops team on daily reports monitoring
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: SP00238 - $0.00 is invalid for adjustment.amount. Must be greater than  $0.00*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: SP00365 - Error reading Customer using Customer 0*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: SP00380 - Error processing   shaw.spectrum.core.billinghistory.payments.service.LineOfCreditBillingHistoryPaymentService.processLineOfCreditBillingHistoryPostPaymentEvent*"))
  OR ((stacktrace matches "*Read timed out executing * https://spectrumapi*")
      OR (stacktrace matches "*spectrum.exceptions.SpectrumUnauthorizedException*")
      OR (stacktrace matches "*Unexpected server exception of type SpectrumUnauthorizedException*")) // see "PCL-CLSS Spectrum Auth alert"
  OR (stacktrace matches "*CfErrorResponse(code=1815, codeName=UNEXPECTED_ERROR, message=Server Exception while creating new decision*") // PLC-5165
  OR (m matches "*Account with getExternalAccountId *-PENDING_PRINCIPAL_PAYMENT does not allow overdraft but has a balance*")            // PLC-5312
  OR (m matches "*ledger_journal_entry_idempotency_key_key*Detail: Key (idempotency_key)=(PENDING_PRINCIPAL_PAYMENT_RELEASE-*")          // PLC-5312
  OR (stacktrace matches "*ledger_journal_entry_idempotency_key_key*Detail: Key (idempotency_key)=(PENDING_PRINCIPAL_PAYMENT_RELEASE-*") // PLC-5312
  OR (m matches "*Cannot find chargeoff account for loanHoldingSummaryId=[*],  loanAccountNumber=*") // PLC-4614
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.exceptions.InvalidTokenException: Access token*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"draw_idempotency_key_unique_constraint\"*")) //PLC-3635
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*com.credify.creditlineservicing.service.payment.MasterlinePayOffAmountService.getPayOffQuote(MasterlinePayOffAmountService.java:101)*") and ("*SP00445 - Account is not open; it cannot be modified.*")) //PLC-6075
  OR (m matches "*INVALID_AMOUNT_FOR_PAYMENT_WITH_BROKERAGE_CASH_BALANCE*")    // PLC-6119
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*com.credify.core.exception.CfInternalServerException: Minimum draw limits are missing*")) //PLC-5993
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*com.credify.core.exception.CfInternalServerException: Unexpected error occurred while calling spectrum*")
  OR (m matches "*Principal Curtailment payment NOT scheduled in spectrum for OneTimePaymentId=*")//ONE-506
  OR (m matches "*SP00589*")//ONE-506
  OR (stacktrace matches "*com.credify.creditlineservicing.service.event.UpdatePreferredDisbursementToACHFacade*")//PLC-3947 (Listener Fix on Platform for log)
OR (m matches "*is not postable when Allowed Transaction Closed To Posting is set to CLOSED*") //PLC-6318
OR (m matches "*Unexpected server exception of type DataIntegrityViolationException*" and m matches "*auto_pay_account_number_idx*") //PLC-6688
OR (m matches "*duplicate key value violates unique constraint*" and m matches "*auto_pay_account_number_idx*") //PLC-6688
OR (m matches "*ObjectOptimisticLockingFailureException*" and m matches "*com.credify.creditlineservicing.data.domain.AutoPay*") //PLC-6688
OR (m matches "*No reward account found for given masterLineAccountNumber*" and m matches "*NO_MASTER_LINE_REWARD_ACCOUNT_FOUND*") //PLC-7066
OR ((stacktrace matches "*[401 Unauthorized]*" or stacktrace matches "*invalid_token*")
    and stacktrace matches "*TabapayServiceGatewayImpl.queryCardInfo*") //PLC-6523
OR (m matches "*Data fetcher failure: operationType=QUERY operation=getMasterLineAccountDetailsSummary type=MasterLineAccountDetailsSummary field=paymentDetails*")
OR (m matches "*MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException*Failed to convert value of type*" and srcid="app-by-phone-ui") //PLC-6357 - agent input that we can't fix
OR (m matches "*Offset commit failed on partition * The coordinator is not aware of this member*") //non-actionable kafka hiccup
OR (m matches "*SP02371 - Financial Account already exists with*") //PLC-7326
))
| timeslice 1d
| count as alertsPerDay by _timeslice 
| avg (alertsPerDay)

OR (stacktrace matches "*duplicate key value violates unique constraint*" and stacktrace matches "*PCL_PHYSICAL_CARD) already exists.*") //PLC-6688
OR (m matches "*duplicate key value violates unique constraint*" and m matches "*PCL_PHYSICAL_CARD) already exists.*") //PLC-6688
OR (m matches "*ErrorResponse=CfErrorResponse(code=0, codeName=null, message=Unexpected server exception of type HttpMessageNotReadableException, retryable=false, type=ABNORMAL, httpStatus=null), message=JSON parse error: Numeric value*"  AND stacktrace matches ("*com.credify.marqeta.external.model.ThreeDSTransition*")) //PLC-6778 and PLC-6779

search.queryText:
_sourceCategory=prod/app/java AND ("CONSUME_SUCCESS" or "CONSUME_FAILED" or "CONSUME_RETRIES_EXHAUSTED") and !"unique constraint \"task_execution_idempotency_idx\""
and ("AuthorizationClearingEventProcessor" or "AuthorizationForcePostClearingEventProcessor")
| json auto
| where app in ("card-srvc")
| kv "topic"
| parse regex "EVENT_ID:(?<eventId>[\d\w-.]+),"
| parse regex "consumerGroupId=(?<eventListenerId>[\d\w-.]+)"
| concat(eventListenerId, "-", eventId) as txId
| transactionize txId (merge _raw join with "\n\n", eventId takeFirst, eventListenerId takeFirst, _sourceName takeFirst, _sourceHost takeFirst)
| if(_raw matches "*CONSUME_SUCCESS*", 1, 0) as consume_success
| if(_raw matches "*CONSUME_FAILED*", 1, 0) as consume_failed
| if(_raw matches "*CONSUME_RETRIES_EXHAUSTED*", 1, 0) as consume_retries_exhausted
| sum(consume_success) as consume_success_count, sum(consume_failed) as consume_failed_count, sum(consume_retries_exhausted) as consume_retries_exhausted_count by eventId, eventListenerId, _raw, _sourceName, _sourceHost
| where consume_success_count = 0 and (consume_failed_count > 0 or consume_retries_exhausted_count > 0)
| fields eventid, eventlistenerid, _raw, _sourceName, _sourceHost

search.queryText:
_sourceCategory="prod/app/java" AND _sourceName="card-srvc" AND "Auth notification saved as marqetaNotification."
| json auto
| parseDate("2022-11-09", "yyyy-MM-dd") as milliseconds
| where timestamp > milliseconds
| where p = "INFO"

children.name: card-srvc - Declined JIT webhooks (day traffic)

search.queryText:
_sourceCategory="prod/app/java" AND _sourceName="card-srvc" AND "Auth notification saved as marqetaNotification."
| json auto
| where p = "INFO"
| where app = "card-srvc"
| where m matches ("Auth notification saved as marqetaNotification. ID=*, token=*, accountNumber=*, gatewayResponseTimedOut=*, state=*, type=*")
| parse "state=*," as state
| where state matches ("DECLINED") OR state matches ("PENDING") 
| if (state matches "DECLINED*", 1, 0) as declinedTransaction
| if (state matches "*", 1, 0) as totalTransaction
| sum(declinedTransaction) as declinedTransaction, sum(totalTransaction) as totalTransaction
| (declinedTransaction/totalTransaction)*100 as percentage
| fields percentage
| where percentage > 50

children.description: This alert gets triggered when the declined JIT webhooks rate exceeds the expected thresholds (50% an hour). You can check JIT webhook statistics dashboard on Sumo Logic to get more info about the context (specially Declined JIT webhooks percentage chart)

| where m matches ("Auth notification saved as marqetaNotification. ID=*, token=*, accountNumber=*, gatewayResponseTimedOut=*, state=*, type=*")

children.name: PCL-Errors

search.queryText:
_sourceCategory=prod/app/java
AND (_sourceName=/app/creditline-servicing-server-*-RC/logs/server.log OR _sourceName="creditline-servicing-srvc")
AND "ERROR"
AND !"UnknownProducerIdException"
| formatDate(_messagetime, "HH") as hour
| json auto
| where p = "ERROR"
| where !(
  (stacktrace matches ("*org.apache.catalina.connector.ClientAbortException: java.io.IOException: Broken pipe*"))
  OR (l matches ("*.HttpProjectConfigManager") and m = "Error fetching datafile") // Optimizely timeout (PLC-6294)
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*CfBadRequestException: Invalid hardship SubLine details for masterLineAccountNumber*"))
  OR (m matches ("*errorResponse is null. Possibly n/w outage*"))
  OR (m matches ("Exception during execution of state machine operation. retryState=ABORTED, retryCount=1, msg=Cannot enroll subLineAccountNumber=* for masterLineAccountNumber=* into hardship planUuid=*  with daysPastDue=* and numberOfPastDueBills=*"))
  OR (m matches ("*SP00379 - More than one active Customer record found for*"))
  OR (m matches ("*SP01218 - Only Account Status of OPEN or PIPELINE is valid for this function.*"))
  OR (m matches ("*SP01859 - customer.financialAccounts[0].abaRoutingNumber is required when customer.financialAccounts[0].isEligibleForPaymentDraft is true*"))
  OR (m matches ("*SP02370 - An inactive PaymentDraft with Financial Account*")) // ADDED to stop leaking PII in logs
  OR (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"payment_message_id_key\"*"))
  OR (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"ledger_journal_entry_idempotency_key_key\"*  Detail: Key (idempotency_key)=(DRAW_CANCELLED-ACCESS_CARD_*) already exists."))
  OR (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"brokerage_account_payment_request_idempotency_key_status_uk\"*"))
  OR (message matches ("*SP01218 - Only Account Status of OPEN or PIPELINE is valid for this function.*"))
  OR (message matches ("*SP01859 - customer.financialAccounts[0].abaRoutingNumber is required when customer.financialAccounts[0].isEligibleForPaymentDraft is true.*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SP00365 - Error reading MasterLineOfCredit using MasterLineOfCredit 0.*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SP00579 - No more than one Payment Draft may exist.*")) // UPGR-1102
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SP01218 - Only Account Status of OPEN or PIPELINE is valid for this function.*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SP02235 - Sub-Line Payment Schedule Due Date *must equal due date *of existing sub-lines when Bill Pay as Master LOC Level is true*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: SP01325 - Transaction (ADD1TMMLOC - One Time Master LOC ACH Payment)*")) // to be removed once PLC-7356 is completed
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: System Exception, java.lang.NullPointerException*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: SP00536 - is required*")) // Covered by Ops team on daily reports monitoring
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: SP00238 - $0.00 is invalid for adjustment.amount. Must be greater than  $0.00*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: SP00365 - Error reading Customer using Customer 0*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*SpectrumException: SP00380 - Error processing   shaw.spectrum.core.billinghistory.payments.service.LineOfCreditBillingHistoryPaymentService.processLineOfCreditBillingHistoryPostPaymentEvent*"))
  OR ((stacktrace matches "*Read timed out executing * https://spectrumapi*")
      OR (stacktrace matches "*spectrum.exceptions.SpectrumUnauthorizedException*")
      OR (stacktrace matches "*Unexpected server exception of type SpectrumUnauthorizedException*")) // see "PCL-CLSS Spectrum Auth alert"
  OR (stacktrace matches "*CfErrorResponse(code=1815, codeName=UNEXPECTED_ERROR, message=Server Exception while creating new decision*") // PLC-5165
  OR (m matches "*Account with getExternalAccountId *-PENDING_PRINCIPAL_PAYMENT does not allow overdraft but has a balance*")            // PLC-5312
  OR (m matches "*ledger_journal_entry_idempotency_key_key*Detail: Key (idempotency_key)=(PENDING_PRINCIPAL_PAYMENT_RELEASE-*")          // PLC-5312
  OR (stacktrace matches "*ledger_journal_entry_idempotency_key_key*Detail: Key (idempotency_key)=(PENDING_PRINCIPAL_PAYMENT_RELEASE-*") // PLC-5312
  OR (m matches "*Cannot find chargeoff account for loanHoldingSummaryId=[*],  loanAccountNumber=*") // PLC-4614
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.exceptions.InvalidTokenException: Access token*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"draw_idempotency_key_unique_constraint\"*")) //PLC-3635
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*com.credify.creditlineservicing.service.payment.MasterlinePayOffAmountService.getPayOffQuote(MasterlinePayOffAmountService.java:101)*") and ("*SP00445 - Account is not open; it cannot be modified.*")) //PLC-6075
  OR (m matches "*INVALID_AMOUNT_FOR_PAYMENT_WITH_BROKERAGE_CASH_BALANCE*")    // PLC-6119
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*com.credify.core.exception.CfInternalServerException: Minimum draw limits are missing*")) //PLC-5993
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*com.credify.core.exception.CfInternalServerException: Unexpected error occurred while calling spectrum*")
  OR (m matches "*Principal Curtailment payment NOT scheduled in spectrum for OneTimePaymentId=*")//ONE-506
  OR (m matches "*SP00589*")//ONE-506
  OR (stacktrace matches "*com.credify.creditlineservicing.service.event.UpdatePreferredDisbursementToACHFacade*")//PLC-3947 (Listener Fix on Platform for log)
  OR (m matches "*is not postable when Allowed Transaction Closed To Posting is set to CLOSED*") //PLC-6318
  OR (m matches "*Unexpected server exception of type DataIntegrityViolationException*" and m matches "*auto_pay_account_number_idx*") //PLC-6688
  OR (m matches "*duplicate key value violates unique constraint*" and m matches "*auto_pay_account_number_idx*") //PLC-6688
  OR (m matches "*ObjectOptimisticLockingFailureException*" and m matches "*com.credify.creditlineservicing.data.domain.AutoPay*") //PLC-6688
  OR (m matches "*No reward account found for given masterLineAccountNumber*" and m matches "*NO_MASTER_LINE_REWARD_ACCOUNT_FOUND*") //PLC-7066
  OR ((stacktrace matches "*[401 Unauthorized]*" or stacktrace matches "*invalid_token*")
    and stacktrace matches "*TabapayServiceGatewayImpl.queryCardInfo*") //PLC-6523
  OR (m matches "*Data fetcher failure: operationType=QUERY operation=getMasterLineAccountDetailsSummary type=MasterLineAccountDetailsSummary field=paymentDetails*")
  OR (m matches "*MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException*Failed to convert value of type*" and srcid="app-by-phone-ui") //PLC-6357 - agent input that we can't fix
  OR (m matches "*Offset commit failed on partition * The coordinator is not aware of this member*") //non-actionable kafka hiccup
  OR (m matches "*SP02371 - Financial Account already exists with*") //PLC-7326
  OR (m matches "*one-time payment NOT scheduled in spectrum for OneTimePaymentId*" and stacktrace matches "*SP00366 - Error updating MasterLineOfCredit using ID*") // PLC-7476
  OR (m matches "*has no financial account that can be used to receive disbursements*" and stacktrace matches "*RewardCashOutService*") //PLC-7241
  OR (m matches "*java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: \"3163971411 \"*" and stacktrace matches "*MasterLineScheduledPaymentsService*") //PLC-7397 CORE-1165
  OR (m matches "*code=400692, codeName=NOT_FOUND_CHARGE_OFF_ACCOUNT_FOR_MASTERLINE*" and stacktrace matches "*com.credify.core.exception.CfBadRequestException: Charge off account not found for masterLineAccountNumber*") //PLC-7654 SI-1919
  OR (m matches "*code=400050, codeName=MASTER_LINE_NOT_ONBOARDED_TO_LEDGER*") // PLC-7856
  OR (m matches "*No enum constant com.credify.creditlineservicing.hardship.domain.HardshipEnrollmentStatus.FAILED*") // SI-1997
  OR (m matches "*There are two consecutive failed to complete hardships*") //PLC-7987
))

search.queryText:
(_sourceCategory="prod/app/java" AND _sourcename = "customer-performance-srvc")
AND "ERROR"
AND NOT "UnknownProducerIdException"
| json auto
| where p="ERROR"
| where!(
 (stacktrace matches ("*error\tfailed scraping application metrics*")) OR
 (stacktrace matches ("*\"endpoint\":\"/error*")) OR
 (stacktrace matches ("*org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.exceptions.InvalidTokenException: Access token*"))
)

children.name: ERROR - Issuance Error: PCL Direct Pay

search.queryText:
_sourcename = "disbursement-srvc"
AND _sourceCategory="prod/app/java"
"PCL_DIRECT_PAY_DISBURSEMENT_ERROR" OR "PCL_DIRECT_PAY_DISBURSEMENT_PERMANENT_ERROR"

_sourceCategory=prod/app/java "[FAILED]" "BATCH_JOB_NAME" 
| parse "BATCH_JOB_NAME=*," as jobName
| where jobName IN (
 "PclArixStatusSyncJob", "PclAchArixFundingProcessorJob","PclXPayArixFundingProcessorJob"
)

children.name: ERROR - PCL Disbursement CONSUME_RETRIES_EXHAUSTED

search.queryText:
_sourceCategory=prod/app/java and _sourceName=disbursement-srvc
| json auto

children.name: Enrollment to partner program failure alert

search.queryText:
_sourceCategory=prod/app/java
AND ("marker=TASK_QUEUE_PROCESSOR,operation=EXECUTE_TASK" OR "Exception during execution of state machine operation") 
| json auto
| where p IN ("ERROR", "WARN")
| where app = "dosh-rewards-srvc"
| fields m, t, tid, sid, srcid, cid, app
| transactionize tid (merge tid takeFirst, sid takeFirst, m join with "\n\n", srcid takeFirst, cid takeFirst, app takeFirst)
| keyvalue auto field=m
| where retryState="ABORTED"
| id as TaskId
| where taskName = "DOSH_REWARD_ENROLL_TASK"
| fields m, tid, sid, srcid, cid, app, taskId, taskName, retryCount, _raw

children.name: Alert - Rewards, Brokerage and Ledger - General Errors

search.queryText:
_sourceCategory=prod/app/java AND (_sourceName=rewards-srvc OR _sourceName=ledger-srvc OR _sourceName=brokerage* OR _sourceName=dosh-rewards-srvc) 
AND "ERROR"
AND NOT "UnknownProducerIdException"
| json auto
| where p="ERROR"
| where !(
  (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"account_external_id_external_type_idx\"*"))
  OR (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"book_external_id_external_type_idx\"*"))
  OR (m matches ("*ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"stage_journal_entry_external_id_external_type_idx\"*")) // PLC-5011
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*com.credify.doshrewards.external.DoshApiClient*") OR l matches "*.DoshApiClient") // "PCL - dosh-rewards-srvc DoshApiClient alert"
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.exceptions.InvalidTokenException: Access token expired*")) // Used by login-client
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*PAM authentication failed for user*")) // ARC-3923
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*PrematureCloseException: Connection prematurely closed BEFORE response*")) // PLC-6261
  OR (m matches ("Error fetching Dosh offers search for accountID*")) // PLC-7160
  OR (stacktrace matches ("org.apache.http.NoHttpResponseException: logx.optimizely.com:443 failed to respond*"))
  OR (stacktrace matches ("*unexpected response from event endpoint, status: 408*com.optimizely.ab.OptimizelyHttpClient.execute*"))
)

children.name: PCL-Failed event consumptions v2 alert (prod)

search.queryText:
_sourceCategory=prod/app/java AND ("CONSUME_SUCCESS" or "CONSUME_FAILED" or "CONSUME_RETRIES_EXHAUSTED") and !"unique constraint \"task_execution_idempotency_idx\""
| json auto
| where app in ("card-srvc", "creditline-servicing-srvc-async", "creditline-review-srvc")
| kv "EVENT_ID", "topic"
| parse regex "consumerGroupId=(?<eventListenerId>[\d\w-.]+)"
| concat(eventListenerId, "-", EVENT_ID) as txId
| transactionize txId (merge _raw join with "\n\n", EVENT_ID takeFirst, eventListenerId takeFirst, _sourceName takeFirst, _sourceHost takeFirst)
| if(_raw matches "*CONSUME_SUCCESS*", 1, 0) as consume_success
| if(_raw matches "*CONSUME_FAILED*", 1, 0) as consume_failed
| if(_raw matches "*CONSUME_RETRIES_EXHAUSTED*", 1, 0) as consume_retries_exhausted
| sum(consume_success) as consume_success_count, sum(consume_failed) as consume_failed_count, sum(consume_retries_exhausted) as consume_retries_exhausted_count by EVENT_ID, eventListenerId, _raw, _sourceName, _sourceHost
| where consume_success_count = 0 and (consume_failed_count > 0 or consume_retries_exhausted_count > 0) 
| fields EVENT_ID, eventlistenerid, _raw, _sourceName, _sourceHost

notification.subjectTemplate: [PROD][PCL] Alert: Event listener "{{Results.eventlistenerid}}" failed to process one or more events

children.description: Prod alert for failed event consumption from services owned by PCL team

children.name: PCL-Failed event publications v2 alert (prod)

search.queryText:
("KAFKA_PUBLISH_EVENT_ERROR" or "KAFKA_PUBLISH_EVENT_SUCCESS") _sourceCategory=prod/app/java
| json auto
| where app in ("card-srvc", "creditline-servicing-srvc", "creditline-review-srvc")
| kv "eventType", "eventId"
| if(_raw matches "*KAFKA_PUBLISH_EVENT_ERROR*", 1, 0) as errorCount
| if(_raw matches "*KAFKA_PUBLISH_EVENT_SUCCESS*", 1, 0) as successCount
| queryEndTime() - _messageTime as millisAgo
| where successCount > 0 or (errorCount > 0 and millisAgo >= 180000)
| sum(errorCount) as errorCount, sum(successCount) as successCount by eventType, eventId
| where errorCount > 0 and successCount = 0

notification.subjectTemplate: [PROD][PCL] Alert: Failed to publish one or more "{{Results.eventtype}}" events

children.description: Failed event publications for services owned by PCL team

children.name: PROD-PCL-Task Execution ABORTED

search.queryText:
_sourceCategory=prod/app/java 
and ("marker=TASK_QUEUE_PROCESSOR,operation=EXECUTE_TASK" OR "Exception during execution of state machine operation" ) 
| json auto
| where p = "WARN" OR p = "ERROR"
| where app = "creditline-servicing-srvc-async" OR app = "card-srvc"
| fields m, t, tid, sid, srcid, cid, app
| transactionize tid (merge tid takeFirst, sid takeFirst, m join with "\n\n", srcid takeFirst, cid takeFirst, app takeFirst)
| keyvalue auto field=m
| where retryState="ABORTED"
| id as TaskId
| fields m, tid, sid, srcid, cid, app, taskId, taskName, retryCount, _raw
| where taskName not in ( "LINE_SERVICING_AUTH_CANCEL_ACTION", "MASTER_LINE_HARDSHIP_ENROLLMENT_TASK","MASTERLINE_CYCLING_TASK", "POST_CHARGEOFF_ACCOUNT_UPDATE_TASK") 
| where !(
  (m matches "*SP00723*") // PLC-3718
  OR (m matches "*SP00365 - Error reading BillingHistory using BillingHistory*") // PLC-4344
  OR (m matches "*SP02410 - Actions related to Payment Drafts can only be done at MLOC level.*") // PLC-5089
  OR (m matches "*Hardship*cannot be applied because it requires to modify a payment with an already paid bill for masterLineAccountNumber*") // PLC-5127
  OR (_raw matches ("*CfBadRequestException: Card cannot be updated to * status. reason=Card is already in the same state.*")) // PLC-5113
  OR (_raw matches ("*CfBadRequestException: Card cannot be updated to * status. reason=Transition not allowed from TERMINATED to ACTIVE*")) // PLC-5113
  OR (_raw matches ("*The reissue source card must be latest active or suspended card in the chain*")) // PLC-7219
)

children.description: All ABORTED tasks execution for PCL team
